AI Description: GetDist is a Python package for analyzing Monte Carlo Markov Chains (MCMC) samples, primarily used in cosmological parameter estimation. It provides tools for plotting and analyzing MCMC samples, computing confidence limits, and generating parameter constraints and posterior plots.
Core Features: Analysis Of Mcmc Samples, Parameter Estimation In Cosmology, Generation Of Parameter Constraints & Posterior Plots, Computation Of Confidence Limits
General Tags: Mcmc Analysis, Parameter Estimation, Posterior Plots, Cosmology
